About.title: ABOUT US
About.subtitle: Our Approach and Dedication
About.description: At LumarSoft, we are a software consulting firm specializing in providing customized and efficient solutions for businesses of all sizes. Our team of development experts is committed to being your strategic partner in achieving your technological goals, delivering high-quality solutions that drive the success of our clients. Our mission is to thoroughly understand your needs and provide innovations that exceed your expectations, with a constant focus on technical excellence and customer satisfaction.

Portfolio.title: PORTFOLIO
Portfolio.subtitle: Discover Our Projects and Success Stories

projects.title: END SRL
projects.description: Complete website redesign for END SRL, a leading company in aeronautical repair workshops. We modernized their digital presence, focusing on improving user experience, aligning the design with current standards, and highlighting their specialized services.

projects.title: Landing Page for UESEVI
projects.description: Designed a landing page for UESEVI to introduce their identity and services. The page emphasizes the union's values and provides easy access to key information for members and the general public, with a clean and professional design.

projects.title: Administration Panel for UESEVI
projects.description: Developed an administration panel for UESEVI, the union of security and surveillance employees of Rosario. The platform enables efficient internal information management with advanced tools for data administration and report generation.

projects.title: Technology E-commerce
projects.description: Created a specialized e-commerce platform for technology products. This platform allows users to explore a wide range of products and, instead of making direct purchases, they are redirected to chat with the seller to coordinate the purchase, facilitating more direct and personalized communication.

projects.title: John Pellegrini Management Group
projects.description: Developed an administrative platform for John Pellegrini Management Group, an insurance company. The solution allows employees to efficiently manage the client database, optimizing internal processes with a secure and customized system.

projects.title: Administration Panel and Lotteries for the Mutual of Retired Sub-officers of the National Gendarmerie
projects.description: Developed an administration panel with lottery functionalities for the Mutual of Retired Sub-officers of the National Gendarmerie. The system allows membership management and automated lotteries, with real-time reports and efficient information management.

services.title: Ecommerce
services.description: We develop custom e-commerce platforms to maximize your online sales.

services.title: Landing Pages
services.description: We create effective landing pages that increase conversion and capture leads.

services.title: Custom Web Apps
services.description: We design custom web applications tailored to your business needs.

services.title: Personal Blogs
services.description: We develop personalized blogs that allow users to effectively share their ideas and experiences.

Values.title: VALUES
Values.subtitle: Committed to Creativity and Excellence
Values.description: At LumarSoft, we are guided by our core values: commitment to our clients and the pursuit of effective solutions in every project. We transform ideas into sustainable realities, always seeking the best way to address each challenge.
values: Commitment to excellence in every project.
Transparency and honesty in all our interactions.
Close collaboration and open communication with our clients.
Creativity in seeking unique and effective solutions.

Staff.title: TEAM
Staff.subtitle: The talent behind LumarSoft.
Staff.description: We are a group of passionate developers and creatives working together to bring innovative projects to life. Each of us brings our expertise and dedication to exceed expectations and create solutions that positively impact our clients.
